name: I.G.OR.
description:
I.G.OR. is a point and click adventure made by Geoff Burrows (Zero Degrees Games) and Gustav van Rooyen (Givit Game Studios).

Help Dr. Brainvart to create his ultimate creation using his new robot IGOR by collecting DNA samples from anywhere in the hospital. Crafting is also a great part of this game. Updates will be released during the week for more tasks. Our main inspiration is from Frankenstein and Day of the Tentacle.

 Controls:

Use the mouse to move IGOR

UPDATE: Unfortunately the game is not done. After the jam we will add the rest of the levels.
